plugins.name: RePic
plugins.description:
Smart Bulk Image Replacement for Figma

Boost your design workflow with bulk image replacement. Effortlessly swap images into your Figma projects with just a few clicks—select your target images, pick replacements, and let RePic handle the rest. Perfect for updating mockups, prototypes, or templates, RePic auto-fills extra slots with a transparent placeholder and offers a "delete after replace" option for a clutter-free canvas.


How to Use RePic

  1. Select images (or their frame) to replace.
  2. Select replacement images next.
  3. Click Replace Images—done!

Optional: Check "Delete after use"
plugins.tagline: Lightning-Fast Bulk Image Replacement

127982.name: RePic
127982.description:

  3. Click Replace Images—done!

Optional: Check "Delete after use"

plugins.name: Sudoku Frame
plugins.description:
Boost your design workflow with Sudoku Frame, the ultimate Figma plugin for creating customizable Sudoku tables in seconds! Perfect for designers, prototypers, and puzzle enthusiasts, this plugin lets you generate Sudoku grids with 4 difficulty levels—Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert.


Choose between Numbers or Letters to suit your project’s style. With the Show Outlines mode, reveal answers effortlessly while keeping them hidden in the default view—ideal for testing, prototyping, or adding interactive elements to your designs.


Whether you're mocking up educational tools, game interfaces, or creative layouts, Sudoku Frame streamlines the process with precision and flexibility. Download now and start designing smarter!

accepted.description: Hey, I’m Andy—a designer and content creator specializing in design, freelancing, and self-development. Here, I share my creative work, insights, and the skills

plugins.tagline: Generate Custom Sudoku Tables with Ease

Whether you're mocking up educational tools, game interfaces, or creative layouts, Sudoku Frame streamlines the process with precision and flexibility. Download now and start designing smarter!

plugins.name: Adtraction Table Generator
plugins.description:
A specialized Figma plugin designed exclusively for Adtraction employees to streamline the process of converting complex Excel reports into presentation-ready Figma tables.


Key Features:

  1. 📊 Automatically splits large Excel files into separate tables
  2. 🎯 Purpose-built for Adtraction's reporting structure:
  3. Koncern (Group) tables
  4. Moderbolag (Parent company) tables
  5. Other financial data tables
  6. 🎨 Maintains Adtraction's brand typography with Lexend font
  7. 🔍 Preview tables before generation
  8. ⚡️ Bulk processing of multiple tables from a single Excel file
  9. 🔒 Local processing for data security


Perfect Use Case:

Designed specifically for Adtraction's quarterly and annual financial reporting workflow. When you have one large Excel file containing multiple tables of financial data, this plugin automatically:

  1. Identifies different table sections
  2. Splits them into separate tables
  3. Applies appropriate styling based on table type (koncern/moderbolag)
  4. Generates all tables with consistent formatting


Ideal for:

  1. Adtraction financial team members
  2. Corporate communications staff
  3. Anyone working with Adtraction's financial reports in Figma

This is a niche tool optimized for Adtraction's specific needs, making the process of converting financial Excel data into presentation-ready Figma tables quick and consistent.


Note: This plugin is primarily intended for Adtraction employees and is optimized for their internal Excel report format and brand guidelines.
plugins.tagline: Transform Adtraction Excel reports into perfectly formatted Figma tables  ✨

plugins.name: Thumbnail Resizer
plugins.description:
Thumbnail Resizer streamlines the process of creating multiple sized thumbnails from a single design. With this plugin, you can:


  1. Quickly generate thumbnails in various preset sizes for popular platforms
  2. Create custom size presets for your specific needs
  3. Batch resize selected elements with just a few clicks
  4. Save and reuse your frequently used size combinations


Perfect for social media marketers, UI/UX designers, and anyone who needs to create multiple versions of their designs efficiently. Save time and ensure consistency across all your thumbnail sizes with Thumbnail Resizer.
plugins.tagline: Quick and easy thumbnail creation for multiple sizes

plugins.name: Nataicons
plugins.description:
A fun-themed simple open source icon featuring over 200 delightful design. A free and expansive icon library right inside Figma.


🔑 Key Features


  1. 200+ Unique Icons: A diverse collection to suit various design needs.
  2. Drag and Drop: Seamlessly add icons to your designs.
  3. Free for All: Use in personal and commercial projects without restrictions.
  4. Developer-Friendly: Available as React and Vue packages for easy integration.


💡 How It Works


  1. Open plugin and browse our extensive icon collection.
  2. Drag your chosen icon directly into your file.
  3. Customize and resize as needed.


🐞 Got ideas or found a bug?


Comment or contact me in Threads. Your feedback helps make this plugin even better for everyone!

plugins.name: Modyo Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
The Modyo Figma Plugin is an essential tool for designers working within the Dynamic Framework. This plugin streamlines your design-to-development workflow with three core functionalities:


Export CSS as Variables: Seamlessly export your design elements as CSS variables tailored for the Dynamic Framework. This feature ensures consistency and speeds up the handoff process, making it easier for developers to implement designs directly from Figma.


Generate Color Palette: Effortlessly create and customize color palettes directly within Figma. This feature allows you to generate a range of colors that can be easily adjusted and applied across your design system, ensuring brand consistency and flexibility.


Font Size Generator Based on PX: Simplify your typography management with a font size generator that operates based on pixel values. This allows for easy creation of a typographic scale that aligns with your design requirements, ensuring responsive and visually appealing text styles.


The Modyo Figma Plugin is designed to empower designers and developers, making collaboration smoother and more efficient by providing a unified toolkit for creating consistent and high-quality UI components.
plugins.tagline: A plugin for Dynamic Framework

Font Size Generator Based on PX: Simplify your typography management with a font size generator that operates based on pixel values. This allows for easy creation of a typographic scale that aligns with your design requirements, ensuring responsive and visually appealing text styles.


The Modyo Figma Plugin is designed to empower designers and developers, making collaboration smoother and more efficient by providing a unified toolkit for creating consistent and high-quality UI components.

plugins.name: Layout Lab
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with automated layout perfection. This powerful plugin streamlines your design process by intelligently handling spacing, alignment, and organization – saving you valuable time while ensuring pixel-perfect results.


🎯 Key Features:

  1. Auto-Layout: Instantly structure frames and elements with intelligent automation
  2. Perfect Spacing: Apply consistent spacing between elements with a single click
  3. Smart Grouping: Organize similar frames and elements into clean, logical layouts
  4. Nested Layer Support: Apply consistent spacing across all layer depths
  5. Customizable Settings: Fine-tune spacing, gaps, and layout modes to match your needs


💪 Perfect For:

  1. UI/UX Designers creating complex interfaces
  2. Design teams maintaining consistency across projects
  3. Product designers working on component libraries
  4. Anyone looking to speed up their layout workflow


🚀 How It Works:

  1. Select the elements you want to organize
  2. Choose your preferred layout settings
  3. Let the plugin work its magic!


✨ Benefits:

  1. Save hours on manual layout adjustments
  2. Maintain consistent spacing throughout your designs
  3. Reduce time spent on repetitive tasks
  4. Create more professional, polished layouts
  5. Ensure design system compliance


🎨 Supported Features:

  1. Auto-spacing calculation
  2. Intelligent grouping
  3. Responsive layouts
  4. Multi-selection support
  5. Custom spacing presets
  6. Quick actions


Made with ❤️ by a designer for designers. We're constantly improving – your feedback helps make this plugin better for everyone!
plugins.tagline: Automate your design workflow with perfect spacing, smart grouping, and pixel-perfect layouts

115633.release_notes:
I'm excited to announce the latest updates to the Layout Lab Plugin! Here’s what’s new:

🚀 New Features:
Rectangles Added to Defined Node: Rectangles are now recognized as valid nodes and included in the auto-layout system.

🛠 Enhancements:
Horizontal Layout Improvements: Enhanced grouping of frames with similar Y positions (within a 3-pixel tolerance) into horizontal rows for better alignment.

📝 How to Use:
Rectangles: Select rectangles with other nodes and run the plugin.
Horizontal Layout: Select frames with similar Y positions for automatic grouping.

Thank you for using the Layout Lab Plugin! 🎨
115633.tagline: Automate your design workflow with perfect spacing, smart grouping, and pixel-perfect layouts

plugins.name: Pitchiro
plugins.description:
Ever created a pitch deck that felt sketchy, wasn’t memorable enough, or failed to clearly communicate your project’s core value—so investors turned their backs on you?


Pitchiro lets you generate professional, unique, Y-Combinator-enhanced decks without worrying about them being too generic or inefficient.


Just select the graphics, font, and palette you like, and BOOM... your bulletproof pitch deck is ready!


Plugin features include:

  1. Pitch deck creation
  2. Pre-made deck regeneration


No AI—just flexible templates crafted by professional designers.
plugins.tagline: Pitch Deck Generator — Unique investor-ready deck templates in a minute

plugins.name: Data Bloom
plugins.description:
Data Bloom is your go-to plugin for breathing life into your Figma designs. Easily replace generic dummy text with real-looking, localized content and user data tailored to your audience. Now supporting 10 languages with 10+ data type options (see below), Data Bloom will continue expanding to include more languages and data types.


Supported languages:

🇦🇿 Azerbaijani, 🇺🇸 English (USA), 🇩🇪 German, 🇰🇿 Kazakh, 🇰🇬 Kyrgyz, 🇷🇺 Russian, 🇹🇷 Turkish, 🇹🇲 Turkmen, 🇺🇦 Ukrainian, 🇺🇿 Uzbek


Available data types:

🎲 Random: Generates a data point by randomly selecting from any of the other available data types.

👫🏻 Names: Creates realistic first names, last names, or full names, with options for gender.

🤪 Playful Usernames: Produces fun and quirky usernames, optionally starting with an "@" symbol.

📞 Phone Numbers: Generates phone numbers with various formatting options, including country-specific domestic styles.

💳 Payment card details: Helps to generate mock payment card information, such as Card numbers, Expiry date and CVV/CVC

⭐️ Ratings and reviews: Generate localized generic review text from categories like "General", "Product specific" or "App feedback"

📆 Date: Creates date values with customizable formats and selectable year ranges, including custom inputs.

📆 Days of the week: Inserts day names (e.g., Monday, Tuesday)

📆 Months: Populates layers with month names (e.g., January, February)

💼 Professions: Populates layers with a diverse list of job titles and occupations.

🎨 Colors: Replaces selected text layers with common color names.


Whether you’re designing a prototype or building a demo, Data Bloom makes it effortless to populate text layers in seconds, ensuring your prototypes feel authentic, personalized, and polished.


✦ Lightning-fast generation

✦ Realistic, localized data (Names, Phone Numbers, Colors, Usernames and Professions)

✦ Lightweight and Figma-friendly

✦ Continuous updates with new languages and data types


Replace “lorem ipsum” forever — grow your designs with Data Bloom.


🌱 How-to Guide:

  1. Run the Data Bloom plugin.
  2. Select one or multiple text layers in your design where you want to insert random data.
  3. Choose a preferred data language and data type from the list.
  4. Click “Generate Data” and the plugin will instantly populate the selected text layers based on your set preferences.

accepted.name: myravey workshop
accepted.description:
Exploring usability, interaction, and aesthetics to craft intuitive digital experiences. 

Sharing design files, prototypes, and experiments 🚀

plugins.tagline: Replace dummy text with real-world localized content (🇦🇿 🇺🇸 🇰🇿 🇰🇬 🇹🇷 🇹🇲 🇺🇿 +3)

plugins.name: Pixel Painter for Figma
plugins.description:
✨ What is Pixel Painter?

Bored in Figma? Need a quick brain break between design reviews? Pixel Painter lets you unleash your inner 8-bit artist right inside Figma — one pixel at a time. Think pixel art meets coffee break.


🎮 How It Works

  1. Fire up the plugin, get a random fun drawing challenge (like “Draw a cat in 1 minute” 😺).
  2. Use the color palette to fill a pixel grid — no judgment on your MS Paint skills.
  3. Timer keeps the pressure on — can you beat the clock?
  4. Save your masterpiece as PNG (complete with a cheeky watermark).


🧠 Why It Rocks

  1. 100+ non-repeating prompts keep the creativity flowing
  2. Click-to-color grid, color palette, and timer — like Figma meets Mario Paint
  3. Works inside the plugin popup — no canvas mess
  4. Great for solo play
plugins.tagline: Take a break and draw Pixels.

plugins.name: C2O - Clutter to Organised
plugins.description:
C2O (Clutter to Organized) is a simple and effective Figma plugin that helps designers automatically arrange frames into a structured layout. If your Figma file feels cluttered, C2O will neatly organize everything in just one click.


✨ How It Works:

1️⃣ Rename your frames with a prefix inside square brackets.

Example:

[1a] Login Page (Row 1, Frame A)

[1b] Password Entry (Row 1, Frame B)

[2a] Dashboard (Row 2, Frame A)

2️⃣ Run the plugin and click "Organize Frames".

3️⃣ Your frames will be arranged into clearly structured groups, placed in order from top to bottom.

Frames without the naming pattern will be placed in an "Others" group at the bottom.


💡 Why Use C2O?

Eliminates manual alignment work and saves time.

Keeps designs structured and easy to navigate.

Improves team collaboration by maintaining a clean layout.

Click “Try it out” and bring order to your Figma files effortlessly! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Structure your Figma frames in One Click!

plugins.name: Variable Color Recommender
plugins.description: Ensure color consistency across your design system with ease. This plugin detects colors in text and design elements that aren’t part of your variables library and suggests the closest matching colors based on precise RGB calculations. Version 1.0 supports fills for text and design elements but does not include stroke colors. Stroke support will be added in Version 2.0.
plugins.tagline: Select an element, get the closest matching variable from your design system.

117869.description: Ensure color consistency across your design system with ease. 117869.tagline: Select an element, get the closest matching variable from your design system.

plugins.name: Font Theme
plugins.description:
Not all fonts that go well together match the theme of your design. This AI powered plugin lets you describe your design and its intended audience and then suggests font pairs that match the theme you entered. You can also simply just type in the vibe or feeling you want the font to evoke.


The best part? You can save the fonts and all their weights as text styles in your Figma with the click of a button!


The text styles will save the font weights as numbers because that's how developers code font weights. This will ease the communication with your developers because you'll get familiar with how they refer to font weights.
plugins.tagline: Search for font pairs to match the feeling of your design.

122088.name: Font Theme
122088.description:
Not all fonts that go well together match the theme of your design. This AI powered plugin lets you describe your design and its intended audience and then suggests font pairs that match the theme you entered. You can also simply just type in the vibe or feeling you want the font to evoke.


The best part? You can save the fonts and all their weights as text styles in your Figma with the click of a button!


The text styles will save the font weights as numbers because that's how developers code font weights. This will ease the communication with your developers because you'll get familiar with how they refer to font weights.
122088.release_notes: Now creates matches from all Figma fonts compared to only Google fonts in the previous version.
122088.tagline: Search for font pairs to match the feeling of your design.

plugins.name: Text binder for AI
plugins.description:
Text Binder for AI

A LLM-optimized plugin that lets you enhance text content with AI while preserving your Figma designs. Built with AI guardrails, this plugin safely extracts, processes, and updates text across multiple frames without breaking layouts or losing design fidelity.


✨ Key Features

🎯 AI-Ready Content Extraction

  1. Extract text with reference tags for LLM processing
  2. Maintain exact positioning and styling information
  3. Process multiple frames simultaneously
  4. Built-in prompts and guardrails for AI safety


🔄 Validated Content Updates

  1. Preview AI-generated changes before applying
  2. Intelligent length validation for layout preservation
  3. Real-time status checks for each text element
  4. Clear warnings for potential layout impacts


🚀 Getting Started

  1. Select your target frames
  2. Extract text with AI-friendly reference tags
  3. Use any LLM while maintaining the safety tags
  4. Review changes with automatic validation
  5. Apply updates with confidence
plugins.tagline: AI-enhanced, design-protected

plugins.name: Export Frame 2 Json
plugins.description:
A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .


一个将Frame里的元素信息自定义导出json文件的插件。


可以将模版内的结构梳理成 background 背景层、foreground 前景层 和 medias 媒体资源（用户替换图片的层）。

Tips: 在交付版本中，模版内的元素（包括文字）都可以转换成图片，避免出现旋转缩放等参数，这样更好定位元素大小和位置。

图层命名前缀可以用模版名称，后缀命名规则如下：

  1. 背景层用「bg」
  2. 媒体资源用「mask」
  3. 前景素材用「sticker」（文字目前暂时转成图片用sticker命名）
  4. 同类型用序号区分。

导出的内容统一使用.png格式即可。
plugins.tagline: A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .

114673.name: Export Frame 2 Json
114673.description:
A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .


一个将Frame里的元素信息自定义导出json文件的插件。


可以将模版内的结构梳理成 background 背景层、foreground 前景层 和 medias 媒体资源（用户替换图片的层）。

Tips: 在交付版本中，模版内的元素（包括文字）都可以转换成图片，避免出现旋转缩放等参数，这样更好定位元素大小和位置。

图层命名前缀可以用模版名称，后缀命名规则如下：

  1. 背景层用「bg」
  2. 媒体资源用「mask」
  3. 前景素材用「sticker」（文字目前暂时转成图片用sticker命名）
  4. 同类型用序号区分。

导出的内容统一使用.png格式即可。
114673.tagline: A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .

plugins.name: Jam Session
plugins.description:
Jam Session lets you run inclusive activities in FigJam.

Start a session as a facilitator and let anybody join by sharing a QR code, unique link or session code. Take control of hybrid or in-person workshop facilities and make sure everyone can inclusively participate.


Learn more at www.jamsesh.xyz


How to use

  1. Start a session with the plugin. Set a timer, an activity prompt, and how you want notes to appear on the board.
  2. Share the QR code or a link with participants. Anybody can join your session on any device through our companion web-app.
  3. Watch submissions roll in. Wait until the timer finishes or end the session early. Affinity map, synth or destroy the results as you please.


Whether you're running an in-person workshop with a FigJam board as the source of truth, or doing something hybrid and just want to ensure everyone can contribute, Jam Session is the tool you never knew you needed.

  1. Keeps the fun alive in workshops
  2. Avoids firewall or laggy machine issues for diverse participants
  3. Gives you control of how submissions appear


Jam Session is in public beta.

A FigJam plugin with this many moving parts may have rough edges. If you find something weird or didn't work, please don't hesitate to reach out to the support email and we'll get right on it.

accepted.name: dano
accepted.description: i do design and design activities

plugins.tagline: Join FigJam activities from anywhere! Run sessions anybody can join from any device.

115736.tagline: Join FigJam activities from anywhere! Run sessions anybody can join from any device.

plugins.name: 角落艺术家
plugins.description:
In the new version of "Corner Artist," I've added a language switch feature between Chinese and English. Here, you can freely switch to your preferred language as needed.


The new version optimizes the user experience, making the overall UI more refined and convenient.


By clicking the button, you can randomly switch to your favorite gradient colors.

Additionally, the new version introduces a "Random Corner Radius" feature, allowing you to choose the layer you want to modify and adjust the corner radius strength.


Here, the higher the value, the smaller the corner radius strength.


I’ve used the superellipse corner radius formula:

|x/a|^n + |y/b|^n = 1

When n = 2, it’s a regular ellipse;

When n < 2, it’s a superellipse;

The smaller the value of n, the closer the corners are to right angles.


For those interested, you can explore the formula on your own; I’ll post it in the comments.

When you choose a corner radius strength less than 1, you'll also receive stars as a bonus.


That's about it for the new features. Feel free to experience and save them!
plugins.tagline: Making the overall UI more refined and convenient.

plugins.name: SmartTableFill
plugins.description:
SmartTableFill is a GPT-powered plugin designed for intelligent table population with contextual data. Unlike basic data fillers, SmartTableFill analyzes existing content to generate relevant entries, making it ideal for tasks like: creating email addresses based on user names, generating addresses aligned with specified cities, or calculating percentages based on given numbers.


Choose between basic and contextual modes to quickly populate tables for mockups, prototyping, and presentations. Customizable settings allow you to target specific text nodes, saving time on manual entry and bringing a smarter approach to data generation.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly populate tables with smart, contextual data using GPT

110927.name: SmartTableFill
110927.description:
SmartTableFill is a GPT-powered plugin designed for intelligent table population with contextual data. Unlike basic data fillers, SmartTableFill analyzes existing content to generate relevant entries, making it ideal for tasks like: creating email addresses based on user names, generating addresses aligned with specified cities, or calculating percentages based on given numbers.


Choose between basic and contextual modes to quickly populate tables for mockups, prototyping, and presentations. Customizable settings allow you to target specific text nodes, saving time on manual entry and bringing a smarter approach to data generation.

110927.tagline: Effortlessly populate tables with smart, contextual data using GPT

plugins.name: Text With Styles
plugins.description:
# Flutter Text Style Inspector


A powerful Figma plugin that bridges the gap between Figma text styles and Flutter's Material Design text theme system. This plugin helps developers and designers maintain consistency between Figma designs and Flutter implementations by automatically mapping Figma text styles to their corresponding Flutter TextTheme properties.


## Features


### Real-time Style Inspection

- Instantly view text style information for any selected text layer

- Live updates as you select different text elements

- Support for multiple text selection with smart duplicate filtering


### Comprehensive Style Information

- Displays the complete Figma text style name

- Shows associated color token information

- Previews the actual text content

- Automatically generates corresponding Flutter TextTheme code


### Smart Flutter Code Generation

- Automatically maps Figma text styles to Flutter's Material Design text theme

- Supports all standard Material text styles:

- Headlines (Large, Medium, Small)

- Titles (Large, Medium, Small)

- Body text (with weight variations)

- Labels (Large, Medium, Small)

- Includes font weight handling for body styles (w400, w500, w600)


### User-Friendly Interface

- Clean, organized display of style information

- Easy-to-copy Flutter code snippets

- Compact, floating UI that stays out of your way

- Simple click-outside-to-close functionality


## How to Use


1. Select any text layer(s) in your Figma design

2. The plugin will automatically display:

- The applied Figma text style

- The color token (if available)

- A preview of the text content

- The equivalent Flutter TextTheme code

3. Copy the generated Flutter code directly into your application


## Best Practices


- Name your Figma text styles to match Material Design conventions for automatic mapping

- Use consistent style names to ensure accurate Flutter code generation

- Apply color styles to text layers for complete token information

- Select multiple text layers to quickly inspect all text styles in a component


Perfect for teams working with both Figma and Flutter, this plugin streamlines the handoff process and ensures design consistency across platforms.
plugins.tagline: Select any layer and get its texts with styles

plugins.name: Behind the frame
plugins.description:
Опис﻿ание

Случаются ситуации, когда объекты оказываются за фреймами и вы не знаете какие из них. Как бы вы их не нашли, при большом количестве фреймов поместить их в нужный в панели слоев не самое простое занятие, а вынести за пределы и снова внутрь не гарантирует поместить на тоже место. Этот плагин упрощает это действие.


Select all out-of-frame objects

Selects all objects that are out of frames.


Objects in frames

Places all selected objects in the frames above them.

  1. Select the objects along with the frames and run the script.
  2. All selected objects will end up in the frames they visually match.


Выбрать всё вне фреймов

Выбирает все объекты которые находятся вне фреймов.


Объекты во фреймы

Помещает все выделенные объекты во фреймы над которыми находятся.

  1. Выделите объекты вместе с фреймами и запустите скрипт.
  2. Все выделенные объекты окажутся во фреймах с которыми совпадают визуально.
plugins.tagline: In order to place objects that are behind frames into frames

Selects all objects that are out of frames.

plugins.name: Spelling Checker
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you find English spelling mistakes inside your Figma designs quickly and effortlessly. By default, it checks all the text on the page. If you select a specific frame or text layer, it will only scan those. Smart, simple, and focused on making your designs error-free.


It’s a lightweight tool built to improve content accuracy without interrupting your workflow.


→ Detects spelling mistakes across your design

→ Works on full pages or selected layers

→ Minimal, clean, and easy to use


I love working at the intersection of design and code. If you're building creative tools, design plugins, or storytelling experiences, let’s connect.


Reach out anytime: hey@abdulwahab.design

Or connect on LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/heyabdulwahab/

accepted.name: Abdul Wahab
accepted.description:

plugins.tagline: Real-time spelling correction in any text field

I love working at the intersection of design and code. If you're building creative tools, design plugins, or storytelling experiences, let’s connect.


Reach out anytime: hey@abdulwahab.design

Or connect on LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/heyabdulwahab/
133153.tagline: Real-time spelling correction in any text field

plugins.name: Button Genie Pro
plugins.description:
Welcome to Button Genie Pro, the Figma plugin that instantly generates a fully featured button component set with every variant, state and Token, so you can focus on design, not tedious setup.


https://geniepro.app/


Quick Start


1. Create a new page in your Figma file where you want to place your button component set.

2. Run the plugin: Search for Button Genie Pro.

3. Follow the two-step UI to create variables and generate buttons.



Create Variables Foundations


On the first screen of the plugin, a single click generates 5 variable collections to lay the foundation of your button system. This makes updating your buttons much more flexible:

00 Primitives

01 Style Tokens

02 Semantic Colors

03 Sizing Tokens

04 Component Tokens

05 Typography



Preview and Generate Button Set


1. Light and Dark Mode: See your Primary, Secondary, and Tertiary buttons side by side in Light and Dark Mode. When you choose your Light or Dark Base Color, Button Genie Pro will automatically define the reverted color. (You can always tweaks colors later in your Figma Variables section).

2. Real-time Contrast Check always make sure your text meets WCAG AA or AAA standards.

3. Customize:

- Button text

- Stroke width for secondary button

- Horizontal/vertical padding, gap, and border radius

- Toggle variants: hover, focus, selected, disabled

- Add icon-only or pill-shaped buttons

4. Create Button Set: Click to generate up to 360 variants (3 types × 5 states × 2 shapes × 3 sizes × 4 content variants), a set of semantic buttons (Success, Warning, Error), and a set of placeholder icons. The base color you choose will be added to your custom color scale (myColor/randomName/50–900) in the Primitives variable collection.



Use Your Button Component


- All generated buttons are grouped into component sets in your document.

- Drag instances onto any frame and override text or icon as needed.

- Variables keep your design tokens flexible: update a token to cascade changes through every button.



Troubleshooting


- If you don't see new components:

  1. Ensure you've correctly generated variables/tokens at the first screen, before generating your button set.
  2. This plugin needs a Figma paid subscription to create Variable Modes. Make sure your have one. If not, the plugin will not work as expected.

- For manual hex input issues, make sure to include a leading `#` and six hex digits.
plugins.tagline: Instantly generates fully featured button component sets with variants & variables (tokens).

plugins.name: Automagic Scale Generator
plugins.description: Quickly generate and manage design tokens for color palettes, typography scales, and spacing systems. It provides an interactive UI to customize color variations (including transparencies), modular or linear type and spacing scales, and then creates Figma variables for seamless design system integration. Inspired by the Automatic CSS Framework for WordPress.

plugins.name: Private Comments – Personal Notes in Figma
plugins.description:
The first-of-its-kind plugin that lets you add private comments to any frame or layer in your file.


Whether you're jotting reminders, tracking feedback, or planning edits — Private Comments help you stay organized without cluttering your file or notifying your team.


🗂️ Attach comments to specific frames / layers

✅ Mark as done / not done

🧠 Keep thoughts to yourself — No public comments or notifications

🔍 Edit, or delete comments anytime

📦 All comments are saved in your file


Perfect for noting feedback, internal critiques, or just managing your mental checklist or ideas directly inside Figma.

accepted.name: Manas Manohar
accepted.description:
Fintech | Product Designer

I love the process of creation. The process of building something new...

plugins.tagline: Add private, personal notes to frames and layers – just for you.

plugins.name: Frame Manager
plugins.description:
A simple but powerful tool for organizing and fixing frames in Figma. Detect duplicates, fix naming issues, and ensure proper dimensions in your design files.

Full Description

Frame Manager helps you maintain clean and well-organized Figma files by providing essential tools for working with frames.

Key Features:

🔍 Duplicate Frame Detection & Removal

Instantly find frames with identical names

Option to automatically remove duplicates while keeping one instance

Clean up messy files by eliminating redundant elements

🏷️ Frame Name Standardization

Identify frames with non-standard naming conventions

Automatically fix frame names to follow consistent PascalCase format

Enforce naming consistency across your design system

📏 Size Optimization

Find frames with dimensions not divisible by 2

Fix frame sizes to ensure clean rendering on various displays

Find frames with non-power-of-2 dimensions for texture optimization

How It Works

Install the plugin and run it from the Plugins menu

Select the feature you need from the simple, intuitive interface

Get instant feedback as the plugin detects issues or fixes problems

Enjoy a cleaner, more organized Figma file

Perfect For

Design teams working on large files

Designers preparing assets for developers

Anyone who wants to maintain consistent naming and sizing in their designs

Technical Details

Lightweight and fast - analyzes your file without lag

Non-destructive - always gives you control over changes

Works with any Figma file containing frames

Maintain better design hygiene and save hours of manual cleanup with Frame Manager!


2025 - WildCard Studios - Art Department
plugins.tagline: Clean & organize frames: find duplicates, fix names, proper dimensions with one-click solutions.

plugins.name: Layer Name Lister
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that provides a hierarchical view of selected layers and their children. This plugin makes it easy to copy layer names with their complete hierarchy or simple structure for documentation, handoff, or reference purposes.


Also pretty useful if the layers need to be fed to an LLM for cross checking against a checklist of fields that need to be included in the UI (that's why I developed this plugin)


Features

- Recursive Layer Traversal: Lists all selected layers and recursively shows their children

- Multiple Output Formats:

- Full Paths: Shows complete hierarchical paths of each layer

- Simple Names: Shows only the layer names without parent paths

- JSON Format: Structured data format including layer IDs, types, and hierarchy

- Cycle Detection: Avoids infinite loops with automatic cycle detection

- Copy to Clipboard: One-click copy of the entire layer hierarchy

- Live Updates: Automatically updates when selection changes

- Resizable Interface: Adjust the plugin window size to your needs

- Performance Optimized: Handles large layer structures efficiently with batch processing


Outputs

Full Paths (Default)

Frame 1
Frame 1 / Button
Frame 1 / Button / Label
Frame 1 / Button / Icon
Frame 1 / Content
Frame 1 / Content / Title
Frame 1 / Content / Description


Simple Names

Frame 1
Button
Label
Icon
Content
Title
Description


JSON Format

[
{
"id": "1:2",
"name": "Frame 1",
"type": "FRAME",
"path": "Frame 1",
"level": 0,
"children": [
{
"id": "1:3",
"name": "Button",
"type": "INSTANCE",
"path": "Frame 1 / Button",
"level": 1,
"children": [...]
},
...
]
}
]
plugins.tagline: A plugin that will give you a plain text list of the layers you have selected (incl. children)
